description.content: Copy user if access should be the same as another staff member - Username format – firstname lastinital i.e. grahamr

items.instruction: Configure the AD account with the Email, Telephone, Fax, Title etc
Users in Office OU should get group policy to mount T drive for them

description.content: AD sync is enabled on TCSDC02. If the new user account is not showing from o365 tenant immediately, you can run the script (Manual AD Sync.ps1 on the server desktop) to push a manualy sync and wait for 2-3 minutes.

items.instruction: Assign an Office 365 license to the user account
Ensure user has been added to the requested distribution groups
Configure the user on the assigned PC

description.content: If this is a replacement user on an existing PC – Deactivate and reactivate office with the new users 365 login.

items.instruction: Add Outlook, Word, Excel shortcuts to Start and Taskbars

description.content: Confirm that user is happy with current configuration and that all required applications are working correctly – only once this has been confirmed is the request completed.
Confirm with Troy if the new user need VPN access, if so, please add to AD group Kordia IPsec L2TP VPN (client installation [guide here](https://lancom.itglue.com/4261478/docs/7827643) )
